reviewText: very few can make science this much fun. my nine year old boy LOVES thsi stuff and it's amazing way to spend time with him doing SCIENCE. beleive it or not- you can acutally  have fun doing this as long as Bill Nye is around. Amazing stuff. Now i have to save up to buy the rest. It's expensive!!!
I have an autistic son and he loves this series. he watches the DVD's over and over. I like the fact that has he is being entertained he is learning.
Bill Nye has a wonderful way of making science very exciting. Any child, who has any interest in science, will love them.
